sense.def:
Če ima človek
patience
, mu uspe ostati miren in se ne razjezi, na primer takrat, ko mora čakati.

seg.quote: Paul was waiting his turn with patience.
I've lost all patience with him and his excuses.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
tries someone's patience
, neko osebo tako razjezi, da ta zelo težko ostane mirna.

seg.quote: I tried her patience to the limit.

sense.def:
Patience
je tudi igra s kartami za samo enega igralca.
